meanings.definition: A rounded projection or division, as of a leaf or petal.
meanings.sent1: The flower had delicate lobes that added beauty to its petals.
meanings.sent2: She carefully examined the lobes of the leaf to identify the plant species.
meanings.sent3: The lobes of the rose petal seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic talent bloomed as she painted the lobes of the flower petals.
meanings.sent5: The lobes of the leaf were like tiny green islands in a sea of grass.

meanings.definition: A division of a bodily organ or part bounded by fissures, connective tissue, or other structural boundaries.
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed out the lobes of the lungs on the X-ray.
meanings.sent2: The brain consists of different lobes, each with specific functions.
meanings.sent3: The lobes of the liver were working hard to filter out toxins.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt heavy, as if the lobes were burdened with sorrow.
meanings.sent5: The lobes of the kidney resembled intricate puzzle pieces, fitting perfectly together.
